headline: Trump: With me, you'll win so much, you'll be bored
sentences:
Vance wins Ohio primary after Donald Trump endorsement

Biden worries overturning Roe would jeopardize 'whole range of rights'

What happens if Roe v. Wade is overturned and abortion outlawed?
Donald Trump said while speaking at an anti-Iran Deal rally that those leading the U.S. are "stupid people" and that if he's elected, people will "win so much" that they may get "bored of winning."
